item.description:
Let's try this July meetup again...in an air conditioned setting!

DoggieDay on Tremont Street (just around the corner from Peter's Park) has generously offered up a Sunday morning for us to go play indoors, away from the heat, for two hours. Hooray!

If you've never been to DoggieDay you can check out the Boston Terrier meetup group photos...all the BTs love it there. http://www.meetup.com...

Don't worry about the $3 per frenchie, I'll cover July's meetup.com dues this month.

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Check-in at the register, they'll tell you what room to head for.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: July French Bulldog Meetup - with AC!
